properties.displayName: Potential DLL Sideloading Via VMware Xfer
properties.query:
DeviceImageLoadEvents
| where (FolderPath endswith "\\glib-2.0.dll" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\VMwareXferlogs.exe") and (not(FolderPath startswith "C:\\Program Files\\VMware\\"))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects loading of a DLL by the VMware Xfer utility from the non-default directory which may be an attempt to sideload arbitrary DLL
